mapper.select: select q.*,p.question_order from question q right join paper p on q.question_id = p.question_id where p.paper_id = #{id} order by q.question_type
mapper.insert: insert into paper (id, paper_id, course_name, question_type, question_id, question_order, paper_name) VALUES (#{id},#{paperId},#{courseName},#{questionType},#{questionId},#{questionOrder},#{paperName})
